docs.snippet: Athletic Director Jack Swarbrick says a university investigation uncovered nothing criminal and no N.C.A.A. rules violations....
docs.lead_paragraph: Athletic Director Jack Swarbrick says a university investigation uncovered nothing criminal and no N.C.A.A. rules violations.
docs.abstract: Notre Dame Athletic Director Jack Swarbrick defends university's actions concerning linebacker Manti Te'o during interview, saying it was Te'o's decision not to notify law enforcement or correct public record regarding his girlfriend.

headline.seo: Manti Te’o Hoax Disclosure Was Up to Him, Notre Dame Says
headline.main: After Inquiry, Notre Dame Decided Revealing Te’o Hoax Was Up to Him
headline.print_headline: After Inquiry, Notre Dame Decided Revealing Te’o Hoax Was Up to Him

byline.contributor: Steve Eder contributed reporting from New York.

docs.snippet: The 49ers’ Frank Gore, one of the N.F.L.’s best running backs, was never as good as he might have been in college because of injuries. But he overcame them — with the encouragement of others....
docs.lead_paragraph: The 49ers’ Frank Gore, one of the N.F.L.’s best running backs, was never as good as he might have been in college because of injuries. But he overcame them — with the encouragement of others.
docs.abstract: Profile of San Francisco 49ers running back Frank Gore, who is preparing with team for NFC championship game against Atlanta Falcons; Gore has overcome two significant knee injuries to become 49ers leading career rusher.

headline.seo: 49ers’ Frank Gore Was a Special Back as a College Freshman
headline.main: A Special Freshman Back, and Then Came the Injuries
headline.print_headline: A Special Freshman Back, and Then Came the Injuries

docs.snippet: Was Manti Te’o a sympathetic victim of a cruel scam or a participant in a phony story to help him in his bid for the Heisman Trophy? A series of events in early December is under scrutiny....
docs.lead_paragraph: Was Manti Te’o a sympathetic victim of a cruel scam or a participant in a phony story to help him in his bid for the Heisman Trophy? A series of events in early December is under scrutiny.
docs.abstract: Journalists, bloggers, students at Notre Dame and American public are trying to figure out whether linebacker Manti Te'o is victim or participant of elaborate hoax; some cannot fathom idea that superstar athlete could be involved in online relationship for years--without in-person meetings; others, younger and more familiar with appeal of online relationships, find him an all too believable victim.

headline.seo: Image of Manti Te’o Becomes Puzzle as Theories Swirl
headline.main: Image Becomes a Puzzle as Theories on Te’o Swirl
headline.print_headline: A Player’s Image Becomes a Puzzle

docs.snippet: Kraft Foods and Procter & Gamble plan to share part — but not all — of their Super Bowl commercials before the game....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kraft Foods and Procter & Gamble plan to share part — but not all — of their Super Bowl commercials before the game.
docs.abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column; some marketers, including Kraft Foods and Procter & Gamble, are deciding they will publicly share part--but not all--of their Super Bowl commercials online before official broadcast; decisions stand in contrast from trend of companies pre-releasing entire spots or longer versions online to capitalize on social media.

headline.seo: Some Marketers Rethink Super Bowl Ad Previews
headline.main: Some Marketers Rethink Super Bowl Ad Previews
headline.print_headline: Some Marketers Rethink Super Bowl Ad Previews

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Armstrong Comes Clean, and Kucinich Enters the "Fox Lair"
